name: Crystalline Devil
description: The Crystalline Devil can disguise itself as an ordinary gemstone, possessing a fiendish quality beneath its deceptive exterior.
memorable: Its ability to charm opponents while disguised as a gemstone makes it a unique ambush predator.
goals: Typically seeks to incapacitate opponents and gain control over encounters through charm effects.
relations: May work alongside other fiends or summon allies to aid in combat.
environment: Often found in dark, hidden places where its gemstone form can blend in.
strengths: Possesses high defenses and the ability to charm and incapacitate enemies.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to silvered weapons, which can bypass its resistances.
attacks: Performs multiple claw attacks and unleashes a burst of crystal shards on nearby foes.
most_powerful_ability: Glittering Temptation allows it to incapacitate and charm nearby creatures.
senses: Has Devil's Sight, allowing it to see in magical darkness.
skills: Excels in Deception and Stealth, making it effective in ambush tactics.
additional_information: Immunities to fire, poison, and the poisoned condition.
Magic Resistance grants advantage on saving throws against magical effects.
Can summon additional fiendish allies once per day.
True form is revealed when not in gemstone disguise.
Duality of forms provides unique tactical options.
test_queries: fiend that disguises as a gemstone
creature with charm ability and crystal attacks
deceptive monster that ambushes and summons allies
strong ambusher creature with dual forms
